text: Johannes Thiemann (born February 9, 1994) is a German professional basketball player, who currently plays for Alba Berlin. ==Professional career== On 3 June 2016, Thiemann signed a two-year deal with MHP Riesen Ludwigsburg. ==International career== In 2016, Thiemann was selected for the German national basketball team, to play in the qualification rounds for the EuroBasket 2017. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Alba Berlin players Category:Baunach Young Pikes players Category:Brose Bamberg players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:German men's basketball players Category:Riesen Ludwigsburg players Category:People from Trier Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Sportspeople from Rhineland-Palatinate
title: Johannes Thiemann
